issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.have iOS 4.1 sdk installed
2.create a new iPad project
3.select the "Run Emulator" tab, hit Launch
4.once the sim launches, go to the iPhone Hardware menu item, and check the values under device and version.

results: ipad running 4.1

expected - this is not a real world config and will never appear in the wild. We should at least default to 3.2 until 4.2 support is out.

{html}
fields.summary: iPad simulator - selecting 4.1 (the default) on run emulator tab results in an invalid emulator

comments.body:
{html}

Fixed in TiDev 1.3.0 CONFIRMED! I'll even claim I was responsible.

{html}
